about_the_game:
Game Features:
Interactive Proofs: Drag and drop expressions or equations to build your proof. Each step brings you closer to proving the given statement.
Theory Integration: Leverage the provided theories on the right panel. Substitute and apply mathematical rules seamlessly to make your proofs robust and accurate.
Charming Companion: Your journey is guided by a delightful character, making complex concepts approachable and fun.
Dynamic Challenges: From simple addition to intricate algebra, every level presents a new challenge to test your logical reasoning and mathematical prowess.
Engaging Visuals: Immerse yourself in a beautifully designed game interface that makes learning and proving statements visually appealing and intellectually stimulating.
Whether you're a math enthusiast or a casual gamer looking for a brain-teasing adventure, "Point Proven" offers a unique blend of education and entertainment. Embark on your journey to master real analysis and enjoy the satisfaction of proving your point!

We know, sometimes, math is just not for you, but give the demo a try! There's nothing to lose here!
